person_say: I'm having problems working with my team and it's delaying our progress. Is there a way to make teamwork smoother?
animal_say: Teamwork can be tricky, but try to communicate openly with your teammates about any concerns. Setting clear roles and responsibilities can also help everyone know their tasks and keep things humming along like a busy beehive!
